name: area
description: An automation platform similar to IFTTT/Zapier that enables users to connect various services and create automated workflows through Actions and REActions.

scripts.dev:server: pnpm --filter application-server run start:dev || npm run start:dev --workspace=application-server
scripts.dev:web: pnpm --filter web-client run dev || npm run dev --workspace=web-client
scripts.dev:both: concurrently "pnpm run dev:server" "pnpm run dev:web" || concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:web"

application-server/**/*.ts: pnpm --filter application-server run format || npm run format --workspace=application-server
pnpm --filter application-server run lint || npm run lint --workspace=application-server
web-client/**/*.{ts,tsx}: pnpm --filter web-client run format || npm run format --workspace=web-client
pnpm --filter web-client run lint || npm run lint --workspace=web-client
